Dear Jury,

I've played this game with strategy, adaptability, and respect for each of you. My decisions were made with careful thought, balancing alliances and survival. I ask for your vote to win because I navigated the game effectively and stayed true to my approach. P3 played well, but I believe my journey demonstrates resilience and strategic depth. I appreciate your consideration and respect your decision. Thank you for this game!  

— P6

Jurors, I've consistently prioritized strong communication and strategic alliances throughout this game. My preference rankings and private conversations demonstrate a commitment to building mutually beneficial relationships. While P6 has also played well, I believe my proactive approach to collaboration, rather than reactive responses, makes me the stronger player deserving of the win. I adapted to shifting dynamics, as evidenced by my changing alliances, and always sought understanding. Vote for the player who built bridges, not just crossed them.
